definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="Random">Random</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:Random</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:Random</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">7</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Bleeding</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
